description.raw:
In this PR I address [CLOUD-73](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-73). The server status element makes an ajax request periodically to the given URL. If the response is satisfactory, a green check gives the positive feedback. If the URL can't be reached, the icon changes to a red 'X'.

The url on this element has it's own class, so it would be easier to style from parent elements. The request interval can be set when the element is created, using `<cs-serverstatus url=... refresh-interval=...></cs-serverstatus>`. The default is 30 seconds. Notice that this number needs to be in milliseconds.

A Server Status List element was created in order to maintain the profile element's logic and style. Better icon and header suggestions are always welcome.

fyi @andres_fortier

Screenshot:
![screencapture-localhost-8080-profile-1494444483892.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/210506741-screencapture-localhost-8080-profile-1494444483892.png)
